original_text: Then he took his staff in his hand, chose five smooth stones from the stream, put them in the pouch of his shepherd’s bag and, with his sling in his hand, approached the Philistine.
korean_text: 손에 막대기를 가지고 시내에서 매끄러운 돌 다섯을 골라서 자기 목자의 제구 곧 주머니에 넣고 손에 물매를 가지고 블레셋 사람에게로 나아가니라

sentences.original_text: Then he took his staff in his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 자신의 지팡이를 손에 들었다

sentences.original_text: chose five smooth stones from the stream
sentences.korean_translation: 시냇가에서 매끄러운 돌 다섯 개를 선택했다

sentences.original_text: put them in the pouch of his shepherd's bag
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들을 자신의 목자 가방 주머니에 넣었다

sentences.original_text: with his sling in his hand
